'It's 5:20 in the
clock that you had sent.'
'It must be very cold in New York.'

'You are a Mumbai guy. How will
you endure America's cold weather?'

'I had sent mango pickle via
Vishwanath uncle's friend.'

'Your mom wanted to
send many things.'

.. India's Independence day
function organized in New York.'

My name is Gurmeet.
I'm calling from New York.

I want to talk to his dad,
B.B. Pradhan about..

Yesterday while returning
from the 15th August function..

Uncle, we have
cremated him! He died!

It has been 3 months
since he passed away.
But I still can't believe it.

I stay awake at nights.
I talk to him.
Parvati, Ajay is no more. But..

Not in body, but
his soul is with us.

Swami had met him
with his inner essence.
Ajay will again come into our lives.

Swami says it is
written in the scriptures.
It is what my heart believes.

Medicine for the headmaster.
It will alleviate his anxiety.

I know a good doctor.
I've got it from him.

Make him to drink it,
with force if required.

Old people tend to be
as stubborn as children.

Sometimes I feel scared
that he might do something.
Vishu, I'm sorry. I got late.

The bathroom bulb has got fused.
Bring 60 watts bulb.

And 2 bread loaves from
Irani's shop. - Bread?

I'll cook potato gravy.
Eat it with bread loaf.
And where are you going by the way?

Why do you trouble yourself by
working at the children's nursery?

I like being among children.
And then money..

Fine! Ajay doesn't
send us money anymore so..

We'll have a paying
guest in a couple of days.

Moreover, I can always
depend upon my tuitions.
You don't need to slog at this age.

Being with children is
not a tedious task for me.

The other day she had
fainted at the bus stop.

Thank God, guys from
the society saw her.
I didn't faint because of the work.
I was on a fast. I was a bit weak.
Your god protected him, didn't he?

What do you ask me
to bring? Bulb and..
The paying guests are about to come.

Vishu, let's go or
else the sun will rise.

Sister-in-law, I've
known him since 40 years.
Headmaster is not bad at heart.

Please.
- Go, Philip! - Just one rupee..

I wanted to ask you
something since many days.

What has happened to you?
- What?

Then get a hold on to
yourself like sister-in-law.

..have given her the
strength to endure Ajay's death.
Let me finish what I want to say.

Reason? You're talking
about reason, B.B. Pradhan?

Remember, when my wife
had died 30 years ago.

You had told me,
Vishwanath, you will have to live.
Do you know what reason I found?

Every morning,
carrying 2 bottles of milk..
You too find such a reason to live.

Driver, just look after
the luggage. We'll be back.
Who is worried about the room?

We just need a place to
sleep after a tiring day.
I'm scared of only one thing.

I wonder why people still consider
an actress as a degraded woman.

And what's the need to tell them?
You can do whatever you want.

Why would they care?
They just want their rent.

And even if they ask,
we'll lie to them.
That you are a steno or a model.

And don't tell them that
you're my distant relative.

And very soon you're
going to marry me.

That is if you will marry me.
- Sujata!

I don't know whether I
should trust you or not.
Estate agent Shroff has sent us.
You want to rent out a room?

When I saw you I thought
maybe you're coming to stay here.

I had come with her to
help her with the shifting.

Ohanging the house is
a tedious work. - Yes.

Yes. He loved flowers,
nature and life.

We're renting it out
for the first time.
My wife and I are very lonely.

But you'll have to keep
it closed during monsoon.

Even Ajay used to
complain about this. - Ajay?

But we.. I mean I can
give only for 3 months.

Don't worry about that. You
can pay as per your capacity.

I know these days
there's so much of inflation.

There's one more thing.
I'm an actress.

I have just
started acting in movies.

My wife will be
delighted to meet you.

I have watched only one.
Mother India.

Shall I repair your fan?
- Oan you repair it?
Sujata, please pass me the pin.

It worked for two days,
and then it stopped.
Actually this fan is very old.

There's not much
difference in our age.
Yes, B. B Pradhan. Get it.

I have to go out
on some urgent work.

I'll talk to you later.
- Is everything fine?

Yes, I have to
immediately reach somewhere.

I'll give you a
duplicate in the evening.
Pardon me, I'm in a hurry.
What is it? What's the matter?
Oan't I ask you for some money?
Why are you talking like that?

D for dog.
- Vishu, let's go.
Sir, want to clear your TV?

Yes. But there is some other thing
that needs to be cleared first.

Thank you. Which
department are you working in?
But.. You can say I work here.

I'm the clearing agent.
- Olearing agent?
Yes. Many goods come from abroad.

And there is a shortage of
officers. So it does take time.

I know all the
intricacies involved in this.
I'll get your work done in a jiffy.

You can give me 100 rupees.
- Thanks a lot!

If you don't mind,
please do it quickly.

We've been standing in
the queue since long.

Where is the Indian
Embassy's letter? - I don't have it.

Only then will you get the TV.
- I don't want the TV.

Listen to me!
- Tell it to A.O.!

Fine, I'll talk to him!
- Next!

For 75 rupees, I'd have done it.
- Vishu, let's go!
Go! Take rounds of AO for 3 days.

Yes.
- I want to talk to you.
Who allowed you to come in?

Go out and meet the
public relation officer.

To tell you that your men
have no manners to talk.

And nor did I..
- Look, mister!

Everybody wants a TV..
- I've not come for my TV.

I've come to collect
my dead son's ashes.

Or do I have to bribe
someone downstairs to get it?
We work under so much pressure.
So at times we are rude.

The rest of the goods refrigerator,
VOR and TV..

..will be cleared as soon as
we receive embassy's letter.
No. There is no hurry for that.
Vishu, maybe we are at fault.

Maybe we could not
provide the right education.

Vishwanath, what
will I tell his mom?
Parvati, I've brought your son home.

This is the last and final
call for Mr. Ajay Pradhan,

passengers traveling
on Al-106 to New York.

Parvati was saying that
you don't believe what I say.

.. I saw your Ajay
searching for a womb.

I just want to stay
alone for a while.
They went to sleep so late.
O yes, it's for you. Money.

So much?
- Yes, it's for you.

Give them one year's rent.
They'll be happy.

Still you didn't talk
to your father, did you?
..that I didn't want to disturb him.

Sujata, your film also..
- To hell with that film.
I want to get married, but you..

You find a new excuse
every second day. - Sujata.
Listen to me. I love you.
Give me some more time. Please.
Get up. They must've woken up.

I got scared. I thought
God knows who is there.

It will take some time to get
used to a third person. - Yes.

What did you say your name, girl?
- Sujata.

I'm sorry. I'm too old to
remember names properly.

I can pay one
year's rent in advance.

We'll take it from you.
- And..

What's the matter?
- Tomorrow it's my birthday.

If you don't mind can I
call some of my friends?
Yes! Why not? Won't you invite us?
Why were you staring at her?

Did you look at her eyes?
- What!
There was a shine in them.
As if life has touched her.

Headmaster, you too choose a
finger. Whichever you wish.
Oouldn't you think of anything else?

Are you crazy? What
can be good news for us?

Sister-in-law, did you see this?
He'll never change.

Remember, when I had brought
news of Ajay's scholarship..
I talk a bit too much.
Vishu, what news did you bring?

..for the post of a librarian,
that job is confirmed.

Yes. - It's not easy to
get a job at this age.

You have reach by 1 0:30.
Ballard Estate.

And the bus
numbers too have changed.

I'm going that way
to meet a producer.

Now I don't know
what relation we share.

I'll be showing the
certificates at this age!

Our headmaster must
be getting decked up.
He takes hours to get ready.
He must be trying his tie.

Dear, try to get a role of
a hero for the headmaster.
He is no less than Ashok Kumar.

The headmaster is
looking so handsome.
Dear, I'm sorry. I got late.

I was searching for the tie.
- It's okay.
Sujata, show him the bus stop.

You don't worry.
- Parvati, I'm not a child.
If you are late, take a cab.
Fine! Am I going to war?

Thank you, dear. I
couldn't have reached here alone.

Shall I pay for the cab?
- No. I have the money.

For the post of a librarian.
- Okay.

Give this to Mr. Salvi.
- Okay.

Uncle, I couldn't recognize you.
- Please, sit.
At that time you were in school..

..and you used to come to
play cricket at Shivaji park.

Anyway, forget it. What
else is going on these days?

But I couldn't meet him.
I'll surely meet him this time.
And you know how much I loved books.

I used to borrow
books from you. Remember?
By the way, I don't need this job.

Have you got your certificates?
- Yes.

I don't think I need to
ask you any questions.

Look, Mr. Pradhan. So far
we are concerned you're in.

And along with the allowances,
around 1 200-1 300.

You see, I think I
don't deserve this job.
While coming here I just realized..

It is very huge. I'll have
to constantly be on the move.

And could manage
such a huge library.

He will be able to
manage all these tasks.
I'm sorry. I wasted your time.

Uncle, if you want to send
anything to Ajay, then let me know.

Old man, give us the money.
- I don't have money.
Take this. What are you doing?

Oheck his pockets.
- Beat him up!

No, brother! He has
still not returned.

He can't see properly in the dark.
And he doesn't even have a torch.

Sujata has just returned. She
says there's chaos in the city.
Yes! The police are on strike!

Where were you till now?
You didn't even make a call?

Sujata, quickly call
doctor Kamat from upstairs!

Why not? If you bleed
like this at this age..

Do you have cotton and
some medicine in the house?

Vilas, please.
- Okay, close your eyes.

Your birthday present!
What do you think? Liked it?

There's a limit to everything,
Sujata!

Do you know why and how
I got this nuptial chain?

A calamity won't
befall us in 4 months.

You want to know why?
- Why?

Uncle, open the door!
- Open the door!

Aunt, Dr. Kamat has
said no need to worry.

I will not come here again!
I won't come!

But he's not saying anything!
I feel like..

I've never seen you
skirting eyes from anybody.

Were you really
going to commit suicide?

I always thought you
were very courageous.

You need courage to
do it, which I have.
The right to end my life.
Parvati, I don't want to live.

Sister-in-law and I will die?
- Brother.

You're wrong!
Everything will remain the same!

I'll also commit suicide with you.
- No, you won't.
I will. Whenever you tell me.

After breaking the fast in the
evening. Whenever you tell me.

Say goodbye to your
Gods and Goddesses.
''Life is like a passing by evening..
''Pain is the second name of life.''
''Pain is the second name of life.''

''The life has become
a stranger today.''
''Why are you standing in the way.''

''The life is like a
bird finding her way.''
''Pain is the second name of life.''
Many happy returns of the day.

Parvati, the poison works
faster on an empty stomach.
Think about it. There's still time.

Just keep one thing in mind.
That in front of your eyes..

How dare you to tell me to
abort my child! - Sujata!

That you'll marry me. And now
you tell me to kill my child.

We don't have any other option.
- My child!
Who else can it be? It is our Ajay.

He is coming back!
Don't let him die again!

We have to save that child!
We have to save our Ajay!
We can't die before Ajay is born!

I'll leave as soon as I
make some other arrangements.

And any woman would have done
exactly what you did last night.
Now stop crying and have your meal.

If not for yourself, at
least think about the child.
Why do you want to starve the child?

I hope it is not too spicy.
- It's good.

Even Ajay used to leave
the ladyfingers in the plate.

He used to love potatoes.
- What?

Finish your food.
I'll get water for you.

He never used to eat it. You
must do something for that girl.
She has been crying since morning.

It's not good for her to
cry so much. For our Ajay..

Sujata, do you really want
to give birth to this child?

But how would I..
- You don't worry about that.

I'm sure he'll
understand the matter.

Why not! After all it's
his grandchild as well.

We'll go and meet
Vilas's dad right now.
Tell me. What can I do for you?

Mr. Ohitre, my name is B.B.
Pradhan. - Okay.
She is my paying guest, Sujata.

Mr. Ohitre, maybe Vilas
refused in his nervousness.
Should I look after every child?

Headmaster! Don't
try to act too smart!

If I see you here again,
I'll break your leg.

Where are you going?
Where are you going?

You can't do that! I
won't let you do this!
Why should I carry this burden?

Neither his dad nor
his grandfather! Nobody!
That is not true! I need that child!
Tell her to let me go.

You know I can't give
birth to this child!
I can't give birth to this child!

..she has no other
option but to abort the child.

Give your vote to the
respected Gajanand Ohitre..

Thank you, Mr. Ohitre.
Thank you very much.
That has benefited me a great deal.

Sujata will give
birth to that child.
Whether your son is with her or not.
I just wanted to say this.

He's a dangerous man. Why
are you making him your enemy?
From today he'll work with you.

Make him put up the
posters on the street. Oome on!

Not to drag his love
affairs during elections.

And now I'm
hearing about this child.

The opposition party will drag
this child in every election.

This child will
give you a hard time.

Mr. Ohitre? Why are
you standing outside?

If a girl's child need
to be aborted and she..

If the girl gets
wounded on the stomach..

Doctor, what about the
permission of your top floor?

Mr. Ohitre, what can
happen without your grace?
I felt like sitting beside you.
I want to watch you sleeping.
I know. That's why I'm here.
Yes, tell me. What's the matter?

Oan I talk to Sujata?
- Sujata is..

She's sleeping.
- Please wake her up.
I'm coming to pick you up.
Vilas, if you really love me..

In front of everybody.
In front of your dad!

Whatever I did this morning,
you think I did it willingly?

My dad will never
approve of this marriage.

You know, he can do
anything to satisfy his ego.
Our future doesn't lie in his hands.

For an ordinary girl you are
tarnishing your dad's image!

You didn't do the right thing
by stopping Sujata yesterday.

She has to live in this world.
No matter what you say.

Giving birth to a
child out of wedlock..

How can I be party to that

Now I can protect Sujata and
her child. And I'll surely do it.

No matter what price
I have to pay for it!

She has gone to the nursery.
To resign.
She said she'll stay with me until..

You must be knowing about the
upcoming municipal elections!

Master, Mr. Ohitre is
very angry with you.

Why are you losing your
life long reputation..

Listen! We've
brought something with us.

Master, it won't take time to

By the way, you are elder to us.

Boss, keep that inside.
- You guys get out!

As you wish! We had

You don't worry, dear.
I won't tolerate these hooligans.

I'll go and report
this to the police.

I have filed your report,
Mr. Pradhan. - Thank you.

But we can't provide
you police protection.

Is it not the duty
of the police force..
But till a crime is committed

Do you know whose
men those 4 goons are..

And messing with
such a man at this age..

Why did you stop my men from
campaigning for the election?
I had spoken to your seniors.

Henceforth all this
shouldn't happen with my men.
Your diktat won't be followed here.

The worst that you
can do is to kill me.

Do you know why
people are afraid of you?
Because they are afraid of dying.

He dies everyday. And
I'm not afraid of dying.

Without their help
I will see to it..

..that Sujata is not
harmed in any way.
We'll have to fix this old man.

Hail lord Shiva! You coward!
- Hail lord Shiva!

Oome out! The locality will

Hail lord Shiva!
- Why are you hiding inside?

If you have guts, then face us.
- Hail lord Shiva!

You couldn't do any
other job in this old age
Why are you staring at me?
Do you think I'll afraid of you?

Scoundrel! If you didn't

Sujata!
- I don't want this child! - Sujata!
There's no milk! Go away from here!

Go! - Boss, is not in

Go away from here! Oome on!

Henceforth don't give
him milk. Understood!
Today they stopped the milk supply.
I don't know what else they will do.

Don't talk anything
about this in front of them.

Did you take the
paper to show the doctor?

Hello!

Get out of the house and
I'll break your bones.
Else my name is not Gajanand..
Doctor, just say yes or no. Got it?

My men informed me she

She is the girl whose

Sujata, you are
unnecessarily getting worried.
Sorry, Mr. Ohitre. I couldn't do it.
Oan't you bring her here alone?

What? - Sir, your
apprehensions were right.

The opposition party
knows about Sujata.

I should have
given it to you myself.
I know. I have hurt you.

What can I.. Sujata is a
nice girl. I like her.

But I'm in a dilema
because of this election.

I take out all my anger
on you. Oome here, son.

If this matter is leaked
out to the opposition party..

And you two go out
for a few days. Okay?

After the election
I'll get you married.

Yes, Sujata! Dad has
given his consent.

He told me to give
this money to you.
I have also spoken to Dinesh.

He'll meet us at
the Pune taxi-stand.

I'll get the cab from Dadar.
Quickly get ready.
Yes. The numbers are the same.

Under the separation
of immoral traffic act..
This is also one of their schemes!
You can't take her alone! You can't!

Don't worry about me! Go with
Sujata! - What's the matter?

Where is Sujata, uncle? - Nothing
will happen.. - Where is Sujata?
There is a limit to even cowardice.

Listen, doctor.
Sujata has reached there..

Not in the evening. Go
there within half an hour.
I want to get rid of this trouble.
You want to get rid of it?
Shame on a dad like you!

Hello! Hello, I want to talk
to the commissioner of police!

No, I don't have an appointment.
But I have to talk to him urgently.

Dr. Bhatt is the in-charge here.
- Who?

Dr. Bhatt! Sujata and the

He'll be here anytime now.
Please do something.
How did you come in? Guards!

A session is going on inside!
- I don't care!

Did you take the permission?
- Session?

Where are you going?
- To meet the minister!

..then I wouldn't have come
like this! Move! - Listen!
Because of me you have this post!

Who is this man?
- I will tell you who I am!

I have invested the most

Alongside Bapu, I too have

And this is what
you're giving me in return!
In order to save an innocent life..

.. I'll have to
implore like a madman..

No! I don't see any
hope for this country now!
Sir, today you have hurt me a lot.
Me. Do you remember me, sir?

Because when I had
stolen money to pay my fees..

..sir, without the money,
there is no hope for me.
Don't ever use these words again.

..that today you are
repeating the same words?

Our system is going
haywire and corrupt.

But still I can say for sure,
sir, that there is hope.
Sir, there is hope. There is!
You tell me what the matter is.
Get me the Nari Niketan remand home.

Today my teaching has
proved to be fruitful!
I knew everything would be fine.
The child has to take birth.

How could anybody
have harmed him? Oh god!

..that I had hidden
it from you till now.

You are very tired.
Rest for a while.
Yes, go on. I'll make tea for you.

The other belongings
of Ajay from America..

I was wondering that if we

We're managing our
lives without them.

Ajay's belongings
are going back to him.
Sorry! I disturbed you at this hour.
I want to talk to you urgently.

..has still not come out of
the shock of Ajay's death.

She still hopes that
Ajay will be born again.
I had not come to say this.

..leave this place
today without telling her.

But maybe I won't
be able to explain..
Whether it's a boy or a girl.

Uncle, I can't leave
without meeting aunt.

They're you leaving?
Where are they going?
I said where are you going?
Vilas, where are you taking her?

You don't know! Ajay
has to still take birth!
How can she take away Ajay?

Parvati, your Ajay is not
going to take birth again!

No, this is not true!
- This is the truth!

I've been hearing your

Vilas, take her away from here!

Sujata! Where are you

Ajay! Now stop
playing the instrument.

If your dad comes,
I'll get the scolding.

Oome on. And how many

Don't enter the
kitchen wearing the shoes.

And why is the
school bag lying here?

Have you counted
the dollars properly?

I don't know what
happens to brother.

The picture hanging on
the walls and memories.

You can't die for
those who are already dead.

From today you'll come
with me for a stroll. - No!

Headmaster, where had you

I'm your Lakshman (Ram's loyal
